trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANARK111_04561_SEQ_00<tab>Maru is plotting something tasty.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANARK111_04561_TODO_00<tab>Deliver steaming victuals and amra to workers in the jungle.
TEXT_BANARK111_04561_MARU_000_000<tab>You got time to spare? 'Cause I've got grub to share. Specifically with the folks protectin' the ruins an' temples in the Shroud of the Samgha...
TEXT_BANARK111_04561_MARU_000_001<tab>Here, take these sweets an' eats an' follow the sound of rumblin' bellies. Tell them the Hippo Riders sent you...
TEXT_BANARK111_04561_RADIANTHOSTA04561_000_011<tab>For me? Why, my greatest thanks to you, good <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>!
TEXT_BANARK111_04561_RADIANTHOSTA04561_000_012<tab>Of all the things to encounter in these jungles, a warm meal is a welcome surprise indeed.

TEXT_BANARK111_04561_RADIANTHOSTA04561_000_013<tab>We have resumed our regular patrols, so you may rest easy under the watchful eye of the Radiant Host. Be sure to pass along my regards to your Riders!
TEXT_BANARK111_04561_RADIANTHOSTB04561_000_014<tab>If it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! What brings you out this far?
TEXT_BANARK111_04561_RADIANTHOSTB04561_000_015<tab>Warm vittles with ripe amra for dessert! Why, my empty stomach was just serenading me with discontent but moments ago─might you have heard it?
TEXT_BANARK111_04561_RADIANTHOSTB04561_000_016<tab>If this aroma is to be believed, I daresay I shall soon become a true fanatic of the Hippo Riders' meal service. My thanks to you!
TEXT_BANARK111_04561_ROOKIESTEWARD04561_000_020<tab>Oh, hello! Have you business with me?
TEXT_BANARK111_04561_ROOKIESTEWARD04561_000_021<tab>Who would I be to deny such delectable generosity? I humbly accept!

TEXT_BANARK111_04561_ROOKIESTEWARD04561_000_022<tab>We are by no means yet free of the shadow of misfortune, but it is precisely for this reason that I became a steward. After I have partaken in your kindness, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, I shall finish the rest of my rounds with vigor!

TEXT_BANARK111_04561_MARU_000_042<tab>Those temples an' ruins are important parts of our culture, so sendin' out the occasional warm meal to our guardians is the least we can do. Here's a little somethin' for you, too...
